ygData.messageBody:
>Question, does someone have to submit to being Bound or can you BIND them
>without their consent? i don't knwo why you would do this, just curious.


You can bind only person in your group and only in city area !! i heared
that you can bind also on some other places like a some villages in karana
and one place south ro but i can only bind myself with others only in town
zone. I heared that ALL greater faydark is a town zone not only tree city (
i once bind some people right at crushbone entrance).
Silverion
High elf wizard (against all statistics eheheeh)
